control_objective: Ensure timely delivery of Loan Estimate
control_description: LE must be delivered within 3 business days of completed application receipt

control_objective: Verify borrower identity and OFAC screening
control_description: OFAC/SDN screening completed before loan proceeds; results documented in file
Tri-merge credit report ordered from approved vendor; representative score calculated per policy
Back-end DTI validated against product maximums; exceptions require documented compensating factors and appropriate approval
Appraisals ordered through AMC rotation; no direct LO-appraiser communication permitted
All AUS conditions reconciled and cleared before CTC; manual underwrite documented when AUS returns Refer
Income calculated per SOP using required documentation by employment type; declining income triggers lower figure usage
Rate locks monitored daily; extensions requested minimum 5 days before expiration; extension fees properly disclosed
CD delivered minimum 3 business days before consummation; changed circumstances documented for tolerance violations
10% random sample reviewed within 90 days; 100% of exception and EPD loans reviewed
HMDA LAR fields validated at application and action; quarterly reconciliation against Encompass data
Comparative file analysis quarterly; HMDA data reviewed for prohibited basis disparities monthly
All guideline exceptions logged in Exception Tracking System with unique ID; proper approval authority obtained per matrix
Third-party service providers subject to annual due diligence review; SOC reports collected for critical vendors
Loan files retained per schedule (life of loan + 7yrs); denied applications retained 25 months
Loan Officers cannot underwrite own originations; processors cannot approve exceptions; funding authorization separate from closing
